LanguageData.SadjuukSteelPlate.label: Steel Plate
LanguageData.SadjuukSteelPlate.description: A basic structural component used in a wide variety of construction.
LanguageData.SadjuukMetalGrid.label: Metal Grid
LanguageData.SadjuukMetalGrid.description: A variety of sturdy pieces of interwoven steel.
LanguageData.SadjuukSteelTube.label: Steel Tube
LanguageData.SadjuukSteelTube.description: A variety of sturdy hollow cylinder.
LanguageData.SadjuukWire.label: Wire
LanguageData.SadjuukArmoredPlate.label: Armored Plate
LanguageData.SadjuukArmoredPlate.description: A very high-density structural component used in a wide variety of advanced construction.
LanguageData.SadjuukBasicComponent.label: Basic Components
LanguageData.SadjuukBasicComponent.description: A collection of industrial components as electric motors, sensors, pneumatic actuators, fasteners and others.
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarCell.label: Solar Cell
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarCell.description: Photovoltaic component used in the construction of Solar Panels.
LanguageData.SadjuukFuelOil.label: Fuel oil
LanguageData.SadjuukFuelOil.description: Low sulfur heavy fuel oil. Also known as marine fuel, it is used on rustic installations. Not explosive, it can only be ignited.
LanguageData.SadjuukDiesel.label: Diesel
LanguageData.SadjuukDiesel.description: Fractional distillate of fuel oil. Very efficient fuel for generators, with an excellent energy-volume ratio.
LanguageData.SadjuukHydrogen.label: Liquid Hydrogen
LanguageData.SadjuukHydrogen.description: Liquid hydrogen is a common liquid rocket fuel but can also be used as fuel for fuel cell.
